trans-unit.source: Returns the number of ticks since last user activity (i.e. KYBD/Mouse)

seg-source.mrk: Returns the number of ticks since last user activity (i.e.

target.mrk: Returns the number of ticks since last user activity (i.e.

trans-unit.source: integer ticks since last (approx. milliseconds) since last activity

seg-source.mrk: integer ticks since last (approx. milliseconds) since last activity

target.mrk: integer ticks since last (approx. milliseconds) since last activity

trans-unit.source: The current ticks since last system restart will roll over to 0 every 50 days or so, which makes it possible for last user activity to be before the rollover, but run time of this function to be after the rollover.

seg-source.mrk: The current ticks since last system restart will roll over to 0 every 50 days or so, which makes it possible for last user activity to be before the rollover, but run time of this function to be after the rollover.

target.mrk: The current ticks since last system restart will roll over to 0 every 50 days or so, which makes it possible for last user activity to be before the rollover, but run time of this function to be after the rollover.

trans-unit.source: If this happens, @extended = 1 and the returned value is ticks since rollover occured.

seg-source.mrk: If this happens, @extended = 1 and the returned value is ticks since rollover occured.

target.mrk: If this happens, @extended = 1 and the returned value is ticks since rollover occured.

trans-unit.source: Mouse/Keyboard action during this 10 sec delay will change reported idle time

seg-source.mrk: Mouse/Keyboard action during this 10 sec delay will change reported idle time

target.mrk: Mouse/Keyboard action during this 10 sec delay will change reported idle time
